trans-unit.source: The 2011-08-18 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: The 2011-08-18 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> returns an <parameterReference>Accept-Ranges:bytes</parameterReference> header in the response to indicate that the service supports range requests.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> returns an <parameterReference>Accept-Ranges:bytes</parameterReference> header in the response to indicate that the service supports range requests.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> supports a new Range header format that reads from the specified offset to the end of the blob.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="a3e943b4-5745-4e64-9d6f-728bbefbd5ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob</link> supports a new Range header format that reads from the specified offset to the end of the blob.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8087cabc-5e40-4def-8790-a97a20448946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying the Range Header for Blob Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8087cabc-5e40-4def-8790-a97a20448946" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Specifying the Range Header for Blob Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: ETags returned by the Blob service are enclosed in quotes.
trans-unit.target: ETags returned by the Blob service are enclosed in quotes.

trans-unit.source: In addition, the Blob service will accept quoted and unquoted ETags.
trans-unit.target: In addition, the Blob service will accept quoted and unquoted ETags.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link> can specify a default version to use when an un-versioned request is received.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="65424a3c-ab49-4994-865c-827409598092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set Blob Service Properties</link> can specify a default version to use when an un-versioned request is received.

trans-unit.source: If-Match GET and PUT operations against the Blob service will now return HTTP 404 (“Not Found) and HTTP 412 (“Precondition Failed”) if the blob doesn’t exist.
trans-unit.target: If-Match GET and PUT operations against the Blob service will now return HTTP 404 (“Not Found) and HTTP 412 (“Precondition Failed”) if the blob doesn’t exist.

trans-unit.source: This change applies to 2009-09-19 and newer versions.
trans-unit.target: This change applies to 2009-09-19 and newer versions.

trans-unit.source: The Table service supports projections of selected properties by using the $select query option.
trans-unit.target: The Table service supports projections of selected properties by using the $select query option.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8cfef6f9-eb7f-40f0-9016-dff44d36b6e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Entities</link> and <link xlink:href="c1ff6980-6c93-4327-9d19-69790370e1ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writing LINQ Queries</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="8cfef6f9-eb7f-40f0-9016-dff44d36b6e1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Query Entities</link> and <link xlink:href="c1ff6980-6c93-4327-9d19-69790370e1ee" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writing LINQ Queries</link>.

trans-unit.source: The Table service adds the <link xlink:href="630d4109-2112-46c2-83fc-657d2ab1d26f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Replace Entity</link> and <link xlink:href="2de2c193-befe-4b7f-864a-650f3d861939" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Merge Entity</link> operations, which “upsert” an entity.
trans-unit.target: The Table service adds the <link xlink:href="630d4109-2112-46c2-83fc-657d2ab1d26f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Replace Entity</link> and <link xlink:href="2de2c193-befe-4b7f-864a-650f3d861939" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Merge Entity</link> operations, which “upsert” an entity.

trans-unit.source: The Queue service adds the <link xlink:href="5f574ef2-2371-4336-94de-c2cef61edb6f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Message</link> operation, which can extend the invisibility time of a message or update the contents of the message.
trans-unit.target: The Queue service adds the <link xlink:href="5f574ef2-2371-4336-94de-c2cef61edb6f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Message</link> operation, which can extend the invisibility time of a message or update the contents of the message.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="0a3c4fcc-0b0b-4331-87a1-01d13f3de86e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Message</link> operation adds the optional <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter which can extend the invisibility time of a new message.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="0a3c4fcc-0b0b-4331-87a1-01d13f3de86e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Message</link> operation adds the optional <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter which can extend the invisibility time of a new message.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter can now be set to a maximum of 7 days, up from the previous maximum of 2 hours.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>visibilitytimeout</parameterReference> parameter can now be set to a maximum of 7 days, up from the previous maximum of 2 hours.

trans-unit.source: Queue messages can now be 64KB in size, up from the previous maximum size of 8KB.
trans-unit.target: Queue messages can now be 64KB in size, up from the previous maximum size of 8KB.
